page.description: Properties and methods in the EmbeddedImage Class.

property.name: type
property.description:
Type: "C",
Mime type of image data.

methodref.name: FromBinary
methodref.description: Return type and content from binary 'image', returns true if succeeded.

methodref.name: FromFile
methodref.description: Load embedded image from a file, returns true if succeeded.

methodref.name: FromHandle
methodref.description: Load embedded image from a handle.

methodref.name: FromString
methodref.description: Convert Edge text to an alignment definition.

methodref.name: ToString
methodref.description: Output the Edge text that represents the alignment definition.

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.
